      connectionPoints - the dynamic connection points

    • Body

      public Body​(Body otherBody)
      Copy constructor. Note: this is not a deep copy. Only the attached connection points are copied, not further tail-side components or closed chains.
      Parameters:
      otherBody - object to copy
